description: This file defines a SearchBar component using the Blits framework. It includes props, internal state, computed properties, methods for emitting change events, clearing input, and handling keyboard input for a search interface.

classes.name: SearchBar
classes.description: A UI component for a search bar, supporting text input, placeholder display, and basic input handling.

methods.name: emitChange
methods.description: Emits an onChange event with the current text value.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the input text and emits the change event.
